refnamediv.refpurpose: A bank of filters in which the cutoff frequency can be separated under user control.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: A bank of filters in which the cutoff frequency can be separated under user control

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.synopsis: ares vlowres asig, kfco, kres, iord, ksep

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: iord -- total number of filters (1 to 10)

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: ksep -- frequency cutoff separation for each filter: the first filter has a kfreq cutoff, the second has a kfreq + ksep and the third kfreq + 2*ksep and so on, depending on the number of filters.

vlowres (variable resonant lowpass filter) allows a variable response curve in resonant filters. It can be thought of as a bank of lowpass resonant filters, each with the same resonance, serially connected. The frequency cutoff of each filter can vary with the kcfo and ksep parameters.
